dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from ICC Cricket for funaonlines.com [NRID14606]
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:mikek@nr-online.com] 
Sent: Thursday, April 12, 2007 6:04 AM
To: Response, Legal
Cc: Copyright
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from ICC Cricket for funaonlines.com
[NRID14606]

 

The site www.funaonlines.com <http://www.funaonlines.com/>  has returned
with the same infringing content as before and still has the same IP
address. Please see
http://www.funaonlines.com/forum/forumdisplay.php?f=72 where they claim
to offer free links for the World Cup 2007. 

 

Please remove this site and prevent it from continuing to so obviously
disregard the rights of our client.

 

Regards,

 

Mike Kiernan

 

Account Executive

 

Projector NetResult Ltd

Mulberry House,

583 Fulham Road,

London,

SW6 5UA 

 

mikek@nr-online.com

http://www.nr-online.com 

 

tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1733

  

-----Original Message-----
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

Sent: 04 April 2007 19:14
To: mikek@nr-online.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Complaint from ICC Cricket for funaonlines.com [NRID14606]

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your
below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

 

Legal Response Team

The Planet

 

 

 

---------

 

 

_______________________________

 

From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:mikek@nr-online.com] 

Sent: Tuesday, April 03, 2007 3:34 AM

To: Response, Legal

Cc: Copyright

Subject: RE: [Fwd: FW: [Fwd: FW: DMCA Complaint from ICC Cricket for

funarule.com [NRID14606]]]

 

 

 

The site is using the ICC Cricket World Cup logo (itself a copyright

infringment) to advertise daily highlights of the Cricket World Cup. It

is not allowed to do this. By clicking on the logo you are taken to the

other site that I have complained about

http://www.funaonlines.com/forum/font-color-ff0000-b-cricket-world-cup-2

007-b-font/ which is blatantly offering live streams. By visiting the

sites homepage, www.funaonlines.com <http://www.funaonlines.com/>  you

see that the site is using images of the Cricket World Cup Logo without

permission. By clicking "enter here" you are met with a message "YOU

NEED TO GET A PAID SUBSCRIPTION TO WATCH WORLD CUP ALL MATCHES ONLINE

(LIVE)".

 

 

 

These sites, which have the same IP address, are clearly interlinked and

are both undertaking a number of copyright infringments against our

clients. 

 

 

 

We have been contacting you about these sites for over two weeks now-

please take serious action against these sites as soon as possible.

 

 

 

Regards,

 

 

 

Mike Kiernan

 

 

 

Account Executive

 

 

 

Projector NetResult Ltd

 

Mulberry House,

 

583 Fulham Road,

 

London,

 

SW6 5UA 

 

 

 

mikek@nr-online.com

 

http://www.nr-online.com 

 

 

 

tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1733

 

  

 

 

 

-----Original Message-----

From: The Planet Legal Response Team

[mailto:LegalResponse@theplanet.com] 

Sent: 02 April 2007 23:04

To: mikek@nr-online.com

Subject: [Fwd: FW: [Fwd: FW: DMCA Complaint from ICC Cricket for

funarule.com [NRID14606]]]

 

 

 

We are unable to locate on the web page http://www.funarule.com/ any of

 

the material that you claim is being infringed as of 05:04 PM --500

 

(Central Daylight Time), Monday, April 02  2007.

 

 

 

--

 

The Planet-EV1 Legal Response Team

 

https://www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=legal

 

(214)782-7800 :: 1-800-377-6103

 

Fax:: (214) 782-7756

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

________________________________

 

 

 

From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:mikek@nr-online.com]

 

Sent: Friday, March 30, 2007 6:11 AM

 

To: Copyright

 

Subject: FW: [Fwd: FW: DMCA Complaint from ICC Cricket for funarule.com

 

[NRID14606]]

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please see the site www.funarule.com <http://www.funarule.com/>  (IP

 

address 74.52.105.242) which continues to blatantly infringe against our

 

clients the ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket

 

Corporation Pte Limited by continuing to offer illegal online streams of

 

the Cricket World Cup. This is also the case for the site

 

www.funaonlines.com <http://www.funaonlines.com/>  (same IP address)- a

 

site which I've heard nothing about for two weeks.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please take action against these sites as soon as possible.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Regards,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Mike Kiernan

 

 

 

________________________________

 

 

 

From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:mikek@nr-online.com]

 

Sent: 28 March 2007 09:35

 

To: 'The Planet Legal Response Team'

 

Subject: RE: [Fwd: FW: DMCA Complaint from ICC Cricket for funarule.com

 

[NRID14606]]

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thank you for your response,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

However the site www.funarule.com <http://www.funarule.com/>  continues

 

to have the IP address 74.52.105.242- which resolves to The Planet.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The site continues to forward to www.funaonlines.com

 

<http://www.funaonlines.com/>  another site that continues to infringe

 

and which has an IP address of 74.52.105.242

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please take serious action against these sites as soon as possible.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Regards,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Mike Kiernan

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Account Executive

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Projector NetResult Ltd

 

 

 

Mulberry House,

 

 

 

583 Fulham Road,

 

 

 

London,

 

 

 

SW6 5UA

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

mikek@nr-online.com

 

 

 

http://www.nr-online.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1733

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

-----Original Message-----

 

From: The Planet Legal Response Team

 

[mailto:LegalResponse@theplanet.com]

 

Sent: 27 March 2007 20:39

 

To: mikek@nr-online.com

 

Subject: [Fwd: FW: DMCA Complaint from ICC Cricket for funarule.com

 

[NRID14606]]

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please note that the domain referenced in your DMCA notice does not

 

 

 

reside within our network as of 02:38 PM --500 (Central Daylight Time),

 

 

 

Tuesday, March 27  2007

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

--

 

 

 

The Planet-EV1 Legal Response Team

 

 

 

https://www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=legal

 

 

 

(214)782-7800 :: 1-800-377-6103

 

 

 

Fax:: (214) 782-7756

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

________________________________

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:mikek@nr-online.com]

 

 

 

Sent: Wednesday, March 21, 2007 10:02 AM

 

 

 

To: Response, Legal

 

 

 

Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from ICC Cricket for funarule.com

 

 

 

[NRID14606]

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dear Sirs,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The site, www.funarules.com <http://www.funarules.com/>  is still up and

 

 

 

infringing, it also forwards to another site (with the same IP address

 

 

 

of 74.52.105.242) that is hosted by The Planet that we have contacted

 

 

 

you about, www.funaonlines.com <http://www.funaonlines.com/>

 

 

 

(NRID14607) that also infringes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please take further action against these two sites.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Regards,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Mike Kiernan

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Account Executive

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Projector NetResult Ltd

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Mulberry House,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

583 Fulham Road,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

London,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

SW6 5UA

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

mikek@nr-online.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

http://www.nr-online.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

tel: +44 (0)20 7471 1733

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

-----Original Message-----

 

 

 

From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Sent: 20 March 2007 17:17

 

 

 

To: mikek@nr-online.com; copyright@theplanet.com

 

 

 

Subject: DMCA Complaint from ICC Cricket for funarule.com [NRID14606]

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

To Whom It May Concern:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your

 

 

 

below-pasted complaint has been disabled.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Legal Response Team

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Planet

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

---------

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

-----Original Message-----

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:mikek@nr-online.com]

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Sent: Wednesday, March 14, 2007 10:22 AM

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

To: sheikh200@hotmail.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Cc: Abuse; copyright@theplanet.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Subject: ICC Cricket World Cup 2007 AV infringement NRID14606

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Importance: High

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Sensitivity: Confidential

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

GCC: ICC Cricket World Cup 2007 infringements- ICC_NRID14606

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

NetResult Internal Reference:  ICC_NRID14606

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please quote the above ICC_NRID14606  reference in all communications

 

 

 

with us regarding this issue.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dear Sirs,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We write on behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global

 

 

 

Cricket Corporation Pte Limited who together own and control the

 

 

 

worldwide broadcast rights for the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have noticed that your website, http://www.funarule.com/ is

 

 

 

displaying, promoting and/or offering audio, visual and/or audio-visual

 

 

 

content from the ICC Cricket World Cup 2007. All copyright in such

 

 

 

images vest with ICC Development (International) Limited and Global

 

 

 

Cricket Corporation Pte Limited.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

As you have neither sought nor obtained permission from the ICC

 

 

 

Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation Pte

 

 

 

Limited to use this content, your present use is an infringement of the

 

 

 

ICC Development (International) Limited's and Global Cricket Corporation

 

 

 

Pte Limited's rights.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please immediately cease all such infringements on any and all of your

 

 

 

web sites and confirm to us via email that you have done so.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute

 

 

 

an express or implied waiver of any of ICC Development (International)

 

 

 

Limited's and Global Cricket Corporation Pte Limited's rights or

 

 

 

remedies, including any rights or remedies in respect of infringement

 

 

 

not explicitly stated, whether current or in the future, all of which

 

 

 

are expressly reserved.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Formal Declaration

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

I hereby state that ICC Development (International) Limited and Global

 

 

 

Cricket Corporation Pte Limited are the owners and controllers of the

 

 

 

exclusive rights to the audio, visual and/or audio-visual content

 

 

 

referenced above and that NetResult is authorized to act on behalf of

 

 

 

ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket Corporation

 

 

 

Pte Limited with respect to internet monitoring and compliance related

 

 

 

to infringement of such rights.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

On behalf of ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket

 

 

 

Corporation Pte Limited, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief

 

 

 

that use of such A/V content in the manner complained of is not

 

 

 

authorized by ICC Development (International) Limited and Global Cricket

 

 

 

Corporation Pte Limited, its agents, or the law.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

I, Mike Kiernan, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign

 

 

 

this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the

 

 

 

United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of

 

 

 

perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We thank you for your timely and full cooperation

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Yours sincerely,

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Mike Kiernan

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

NetResult

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Mulberry House

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

583 Fulham Road

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

London

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

UK SW6 5UA

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

immediately to the correct person or department for action.
